name: Lake View Apartment By Favstay
address: 25 Truc Bach, Floor 7th, Unit No. 1, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located 3 km from Hanoi and 42 km from Yên Bài, Lake View Apartment By Favstay offers accommodation in Thượng Thôn. Free WiFi is available .

There is a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with fridge. A TV is provided.

Noi Bai International Airport is 19 km from the property.
